item.title: About
item.description: My Chinese name is 徐世坚. I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in 2018 from Nanjing University (Elite Program). Currently, I am a Master student at EPFL.

item.title: CV
item.description: PDF Education 2014.09 – 2018.06   Nanjing University, Nanjing, China B.Sc. in Computer Science and Technology (National Elite Program) 2020.09 – Current   École polytechnique fédérale de Lausanne Master in Data Sciences Research & working experiences 2020.02 – 2020.08   Tencent AI Lab, Shenzhen, China Research focuses on self-supervised representation learning. 2018.09 – 2019.12   City University of Hong Kong, HK SAR, China Research in computer vision, mainly focus on deep learning and image processing.

item.title: My Precious
item.description: This post is used to record some interesting or wonderful things I read or found. Books 2019 《达芬奇密码》, 丹·布朗 The Da Vinci Code, Dan Brown 《了不起的盖茨比》, 菲茨杰拉德 The Great Gatsby, F. Scott Fitzgerald 《复杂》, 梅拉妮•米歇尔 Complexity: A Guided Tour, Melanie Mitchell 《带一本书去巴黎》, 林达 Bring a Book to Paris, LIN DA 《德意志之鹰：纹章中的德国史》, 林纯洁 Eagle of Deutsche: German History in Heraldry, LIN Chunjie 《存在主义咖啡馆：自由、存在和杏子鸡尾酒》, 莎拉·贝克韦尔 At the Existentialist Café: Freedom, Being, and Apricot Cocktails, Sarah Bakewell 《艾希曼在耶路撒冷》, 汉娜·阿伦特 Eichmann in Jerusalem: A Report of the Banality of Evil, Hannah Arendt 2020 《掘墓人：魏玛共和国的最后一个冬天》, 吕迪格·巴特/豪克·弗里德里希 Die Totengräber: Der letzte Winter der Weimarer Republik, Rüdiger Barth & Hauke Friederichs 《我们仨》, 杨绛 《干校六记》, 杨绛 《走到人生边上：自问自答》, 杨绛 《我在西南联大的日子》, 汪曾祺 《西潮》, 蒋梦麟 《陈寅恪在1958年》, 吴定宇 《东方快车谋杀案》, 阿加莎·克里斯蒂 Murder on the Orient Express, Agatha Christie

item.title: Setting MathJax
item.description: To write math expressions in Hugo, a popular method is using MathJax. This blog gives a quick and simple solution. First, write a script. I will copy the script as follow: <script type="text/javascript" async src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.1/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML"> MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$'], ['\[','\]']], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true, skipTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre'], TeX: { equationNumbers: { autoNumber: "AMS" }, extensions: ["AMSmath.js", "AMSsymbols.js"] } } }); MathJax.Hub.Queue(function() { // Fix <code> tags after MathJax finishes running.
